dependencies.name: Microsoft Windows Application, Security and System Logs
dependencies.description: Microsoft Windows Application, Security and System Logs
dependencies.filter: general_information.log_source.type_name = Microsoft Windows Security OR general_information.log_source.type_name = Microsoft Windows System OR general_information.log_source.type_name = Microsoft Windows Application
dependencies.layout: {"search":{"LRSearchRequest":{"filter":"general_information.log_source.type_name = Microsoft Windows Security OR general_information.log_source.type_name = Microsoft Windows System OR general_information.log_source.type_name = Microsoft Windows Application","aggregations":{"aggregationRequests":[{"aggregationType":"COUNT_TREND","bucketInterval":"1h","bucketLimit":24,"bucketOrder":"TOP","field":"general_information.standard_message_time"}]},"pageRequest":{"limit":100},"dateTime":"now-24h","time":{"field":"general_information.standard_message_time","lrDateTime":"now-24h"}}},"config":{"timeRangeId":"last24hours","timeRangeName":"Last 24 hours"},"grid":{"x":0,"y":0,"w":0,"h":0,"minW":0,"minH":0,"moved":false,"static":true},"columns":["general_information.standard_message_time","general_information.raw_message","general_information.common_event_name","unattributed.account.email_address","unattributed.host.ip_address.value","origin.host.ip_address.ipv4","general_information.log_source.name","general_information.log_source.type_name","origin.account.name","target.host.name"]}
